wavelet analysis
[function for approximation (wfunc)]


Functions

bool surfit::wfunc_decomp ()
 makes one wavelet-decomposition
bool surfit::wfunc_auto_decomp (REAL eps)
 calls wfunc_decomp() while difference between calc_approx_norm() are lower than eps
bool surfit::wfunc_recons ()
 makes one wavelet-reconstruction
bool surfit::wfunc_full_recons ()
 makes all possible wavelet-reconstruction (recontructs original wfunction)
